kpi.name: M8013C11

kpi_info.title: EPC initiated transitions to ECM-IDLE due to Radio Network Layer cause
kpi_info.use: The number of EPC initiated transitions to ECM-IDLE state due to Radio Network Layer cause. The UE-associated logical S1-connection is released. UPDATED: The reception of an S1AP:UE Context Release Command message sent by the MME to the eNB.

kpi.kpi_alias: EPC initiated transitions to ECM-IDLE due to Radio Network Layer cause
